page.title: 09Education In Our Locality
page.content: There are evening classes for adults held in the Girls'Comprehensive and the College for Further Education. These classes are for people to learn sewing,ear maintenance,cake decorating and a variety of other subjects.The people who go pay at the beginning of the year and go for 20 weeks. There are also provisions for adults of below average standard in English and mathematics.These are Adult Basic Education classes.They are held in centres throughout the area in the daytime amd the evenings.These classes are free and cater for everyone over school age. This full spectrum of schools provides an opportunity for children and adults to follow education within their own locality.
